Template Function riming_rain_core¶

  • Defined in File user_functions.h

Function Documentation¶

template<class float_t>
void riming_rain_core(float_t &qr_prime, float_t &Nr, float_t &q1, float_t &N1, particle_model_constants_t &pc1, collection_model_constants_t &coeffs, float_t &rime_rate_qa, float_t &rime_rate_qb, float_t &rime_rate_nb, model_constants_t &cc)¶

Riming of rain droplets with ice or snow particles.

qr_prime Rain mixing ratio Nr Number of rain droplets q1 Mixing ratio of any ice particle N1 Particle number of any ice particle pc1 Model constants specific for the given ice particle coeffs Model constants for collision processes rime_rate_qa On out: Riming rate for mixing mass rime_rate_qb On out: Riming rate for rain mixing mass rime_rate_nb On out: Riming rate for number of rain droplets
